ModMetaData.name: Squad UI Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: drumad
ModMetaData.description: A few minor tweaks to the UI when selecting groups: -shows weapon range when the mouse is over the "Attack" button -shows the weapon types that are equipped -- clicking the weapon allows for assigning targets to all pawns with that weapon All of the code is basically vanilla Rimworld, I just linked various bits up. Hopefully this or something along these lines will be incorporated into [1.0] <size=24>Powered by Harmony</size>
